tinco is a noun meaning "metal" in Queny: Image:Tinco.gifTinco is also the name in Quenya of the first letter of the Tengwar alphabet. It is the first letter of the first grade or Tyellë
Note: which contains "voiceless stops" and it is the first letter in the dental or t-series of consonants
The names of the letters: the Tincotéma. In all modes Tinco represents T. The Westron name for this letter is Tó.See Westron Tengwar

tinco is a noun meaning "metal" in Queny: The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme TINKŌ.
